sentences.en: A gentleman should always be civil, even to his inferiors.
sentences.cn: 绅士应该总是彬彬有礼,即便是对地位不及自己者.

sentences.en: An elderly gentleman was asleep next to the fire.
sentences.cn: 一位老先生在火炉旁边睡着了。

sentences.en: Can I just pick up that gentleman's point?
sentences.cn: 我能接着那位先生的意思往下说吗？

sentences.en: Could you serve this gentleman please, Miss Bath?
sentences.cn: 巴思小姐，请你接待一下这位先生好吗？

sentences.en: Good morning, ladies and gentlemen .
sentences.cn: 早上好，女士们，先生们。

sentences.en: He is an elderly gentleman who had had a cataract operation.
sentences.cn: 他是一位曾经动过白内障手术的老人.

sentences.en: He is anxious to appear a gentleman.
sentences.cn: 他急于想表现得像个绅士。

sentences.en: He is the ultimate English gentleman.
sentences.cn: 他是最最典型的英国绅士。

sentences.en: He would never be improper, he is always the perfect gentleman.
sentences.cn: 他总是举止得体，一直是个完美的绅士。

sentences.en: I got this phone call from a gentleman, who seemed sincere enough.
sentences.cn: 这个电话是一位绅士打来的，他似乎非常诚恳。

sentences.en: If he is anything of a gentleman, he will pay the money.
sentences.cn: 倘若他是位真君子, 他会付这笔钱的.

sentences.en: It seems this gentleman was waiting for the doctor.
sentences.cn: 这位先生好像在等医生。

sentences.en: Martin – always the perfect gentleman – got to his feet when my mother walked in.
sentences.cn: 马丁在我母亲进来时站了起来——他一向是十足的绅士派头。

sentences.en: Mr Field was a real gentleman .
sentences.cn: 菲尔德先生是位真正的君子。

sentences.en: Politeness is an attribute of a gentleman.
sentences.cn: 彬彬有礼是绅士的本色.

sentences.en: She made a gentleman's agreement with her buyer.
sentences.cn: 她和买主立了个君子协定。

sentences.en: Thank you—you're a real gentleman.
sentences.cn: 谢谢您—您是个真正的君子。

sentences.en: The gentleman, despite his advanced years, helped Kathryn back to her seat.
sentences.cn: 这位绅士，尽管年事已高，仍然帮着凯瑟琳回到座位上。

sentences.en: The image of art theft as a gentleman's crime is outdated.
sentences.cn: 把盗窃艺术品看作是一种绅士犯罪的观念已经过时了。

sentences.en: The old gentleman was as spry as ever.
sentences.cn: 这位老先生依然健旺。

phrases.tran_cn: (穿着时髦的)花花公子，闲雅男士
[美国英语](美国众议院)某某州(选出的)议员

trans.tran_cn: 先生，绅士，有身份地位的人
trans.tran_en: a man who is always polite, has good manners, and treats other people well
